title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When a key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not being displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even when the key is left blank in the properties file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key blank but provide a valid value. 3. Check if the externalized text is being displayed in the chart title.
